message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for offering! That price is a little high for me. Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I think my product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about $110?
I appreciate you coming down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still a bit away. How about we meet at $105?
